channel.title: Latest News on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Latest News on TechnoStreet

item.title: WEF Says Crypto Will Go Mainstream, But IMF Predicts 2023 Recession
item.description: WEF Says Crypto Will Go Mainstream, But IMF Predicts 2023 Recession The CBDDC supporters The World Economic Forum (WEF) believes that responsible regulation and long-term experimentation will ensure cryptocurrency’s place in the global economy.

item.title: No ‘respite’ for exploits, flash loans or exit scams in 2023: Cybersecurity firm
item.description: No ‘respite’ for exploits, flash loans or exit scams in 2023: Cybersecurity firm The industry can expect “further attempts from hackers targeting bridges in 2023,” while users are advised to be more cautious with their private keys.

item.title: Public Filings Reveal a $3B Crypto Trader who Still Lives with his Mom
item.description: Public Filings Reveal a $3B Crypto Trader who Still Lives with his Mom According to public records, this crypto trader made over $7 million in profits in 2021 while living at his parent’s house in Sydney, Australia.

item.title: The FTX Contagion Goes on: Midas Investments Closes Down
item.description: The FTX Contagion Goes on: Midas Investments Closes Down Due to severe financial losses caused by Celsius’ bankruptcy and FTX’s debacle, the cryptocurrency platform Midas Investments disabled deposits and swaps.

item.title: California Regulator Warns of 17 Crypto Websites Suspected of Fraud
item.description: California Regulator Warns of 17 Crypto Websites Suspected of Fraud The DFPI last issued such a large number of crypto scam alerts in June, when it warned about 26 suspect crypto platforms.

item.title: Sam Bankman-Fried’s Life on Bail: Armed Guards, Daily Jogs and Gawkers
item.description: Sam Bankman-Fried’s Life on Bail: Armed Guards, Daily Jogs and Gawkers In comparison to his prison quarters in The Bahamas, the former billionaire appears to be leading a fairly normal life while under house arrest.

item.title: KDK Software announces MoU with All India Federation of Tax Practitioners (AIFTP)
item.description: KDK Software announces MoU with All India Federation of Tax Practitioners (AIFTP) Jaipur (Rajasthan) [India], December 20: All India Federation of Tax Practitioners (AIFTP) organized the AIFTP Convention 2022 for all members in Jaipur.

item.title: Ajay’s to tickle taste buds of food lovers in Ahmedabad, North Gujarat
item.description: Ajay’s to tickle taste buds of food lovers in Ahmedabad, North Gujarat (Left to right) Bhaveshbhai & Hareshbhai – Ajay’s Master Franchisee, Ahmedabad with Jaideep & Ajay Solanki, Founders, Ajay’s and Alkeshbhai – Co-owner Master Franchisee Surat (Gujarat) [India], December 20: Ajay’s Takeaway Food, a fast-growing chain of trusted Quick Service Restaurants (QSR), has appointed a master franchise in Ahmedabad as part of its plans to expand […] The post Ajay’s to tickle taste buds of food lovers in Ahmedabad, North Gujarat appeared first on Startup Reporter.

item.title: DPA SmartCloud becomes India’s first ever organisation to be authorized as a ‘Fintech Entity’ by the International Financial Services Centres Authority (IFSCA)
item.description: DPA SmartCloud becomes India’s first ever organisation to be authorized as a ‘Fintech Entity’ by the International Financial Services Centres Authority (IFSCA) Becomes India’s first-ever fintech to receive the authorisation from the IFSCA DPA SmartCloud to launch Cloud-based solutions and services for AI-ML driven Data Analytics, Credit Scoring, and Data Management for the BFSI sector, addressing the huge US$195 billion opportunity in the SaaS market space.

item.title: Matific Math League 2022 Witnesses a Record-Breaking Million Participants, Noida Bal Bharti Public School Wins
item.description: Matific Math League 2022 Witnesses a Record-Breaking Million Participants, Noida Bal Bharti Public School Wins New Delhi (India), December 20: Matific, the multi-award-winning mathematics e-learning platform, is thrilled to announce the incredible success of its highly regarded Matific Math League.

item.title: No Supreme Court benches to be available during winter vacation: CJI D Y Chandrachud
item.description: No Supreme Court benches to be available during winter vacation: CJI D Y Chandrachud NEW DELHI, Dec 16: Chief Justice of India D Y Chandrachud on Friday said no Supreme Court bench will be available from December 17 till January 1 during the ensuing winter vacations.

item.title: Over 1,500 private hospitals empanelled under Ayushman Bharat in last one year: Mandaviya
item.description: Over 1,500 private hospitals empanelled under Ayushman Bharat in last one year: Mandaviya NEW DELHI, Dec 16: Union Health Minister Mansukh Mandaviya on Friday said more than 1,500 private hospitals have been empanelled under the Ayushman Bharat scheme in the last one year.

item.title: Active Covid cases dip to 3,845
item.description: Active Covid cases dip to 3,845 New Delhi, Dec 13: India logged 114 new coronavirus infections, while the active cases dipped to 3,845, according to the Union Health Ministry data updated on Tuesday.

item.title: Minimum temperatures drops in J&K due to clear night sky
item.description: Minimum temperatures drops in J&K due to clear night sky JAMMU, Dec 13: The minimum temperatures again dropped in Jammu and Kashmir due to clear night sky.

item.title: Prime Minister NarendraModi casts his vote in Ahmedabad for the second phase polling of GujaratAssemblyElections2022
item.description: Prime Minister NarendraModi casts his vote in Ahmedabad for the second phase polling of GujaratAssemblyElections2022 Gujarat Elections 2022: Prime Minister Narendra Modi cast his vote in the second phase of assembly elections in Gujarat’s Ahmedabad today.

item.title: Charge sheet against 4 Hizbul Mujahideen associates in J&K’s Rajouri
item.description: Charge sheet against 4 Hizbul Mujahideen associates in J&K’s Rajouri Jammu, Nov 26: Jammu and Kashmir Police on Saturday filed a charge sheet against four Hizbul Mujahideen associates in border Rajouri district here, an official said.

item.title: India’s efforts to sanction perpetrators of 26/11 attacks blocked for ‘political reasons’: Kamboj
item.description: India’s efforts to sanction perpetrators of 26/11 attacks blocked for ‘political reasons’: Kamboj UNITED NATIONS, Nov 25: India has said its efforts to sanction perpetrators and facilitators of the 26/11 Mumbai terror attacks have been blocked in the past for “political reasons” that enabled them to organise further cross-border assaults against the country, an apparent reference to China’s repeated moves to block New Delhi’s efforts to blacklist Pakistan-based terrorists at the UN.

item.title: Six dead, dozens wounded in Istanbul explosion; Erdogan condemns ‘vile attack’
item.description: Six dead, dozens wounded in Istanbul explosion; Erdogan condemns ‘vile attack’ ISTANBUL, Nov 14: An explosion tore through a busy Istanbul shopping street on November 13, killing six and wounding dozens in what Turkey’s president said bore the signs of a terror attack.

item.title: Active Covid cases in country dip to 12,307
item.description: Active Covid cases in country dip to 12,307 New Delhi, Nov 13: India logged 734 new coronavirus infections taking the tally of COVID-19 cases to 4,46,66,377, while the active cases dipped to 12,307, according to the Union health ministry data updated on Sunday.

item.title: Drones from across Pakistan border more than doubled in 2022: BSF DG
item.description: Drones from across Pakistan border more than doubled in 2022: BSF DG New Delhi, Nov 13: Instances of drones bringing drugs, arms and ammunition along the Punjab and Jammu borders from across Pakistan has more than doubled in 2022 and the BSF is looking for a foolproof solution to check this menace, the force’s Director General Pankaj Kumar Singh said Saturday.

item.title: आज की ताजा खबर Live: एलन मस्क के आते ही ट्विटर के CEO और CFO का इस्तीफा
item.description: आज की ताजा खबर Live: एलन मस्क के आते ही ट्विटर के CEO और CFO का इस्तीफा सीमा सुरक्षा बल (बीएसएफ) ने कल गुरुवार को पंजाब में भारत-पाकिस्तान अंतरराष्ट्रीय सीमा के निकट छह एके-47 राइफल, तीन पिस्तौल और 200 गोलियां बरामद कीं.

item.title: T20 WC: Fifties from Rohit, Virat and Suryakumar guide India to 179/2 against Netherlands
item.description: T20 WC: Fifties from Rohit, Virat and Suryakumar guide India to 179/2 against Netherlands Sydney [Australia], October 27: Half-centuries from star batters Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma, and Suryakumar Yadav guided India to a competitive 179/2 in 20 overs against the Netherlands in their Group 2, Super 12 match of the ongoing ICC T20 World Cup at Sydney Cricket Ground (SCG) on Thursday.

item.title: 20 injured in Jammu road accident
item.description: 20 injured in Jammu road accident JAMMU, Oct 27: At least 20 passengers were injured in a road accident that took place near Chowki Choura in Jammu district on Thursday.

item.title: Dry weather, hazy morning likely in J&K in next 24 hrs: MeT
item.description: Dry weather, hazy morning likely in J&K in next 24 hrs: MeT JAMMU, Oct 26: Weather was dry in J&K during the last 24 hours, and the MeT office said on Wednesday that dry weather with hazy morning is likely during the next 24 hours.

item.title: MoS Edu reaches Ganderbal on 2-day visit
item.description: MoS Edu reaches Ganderbal on 2-day visit Ganderbal, Oct 25: Union Minister of State forEducation and External Affairs Dr.
